headline: /C O R R E C T I O N -- Tandym Group/
summary: Tandym Group, the leader in specialized solutions for the healthcare, life sciences, technology and professional services industries, today announced a partnership with ServiceNow, the leading digital workflow company. The collaboration is designed to accelerate the development, certification, and deployment of skilled ServiceNow professionals – bridging critical talent gaps and helping organizations scale faster in an evolving digital landscape.

headline: SwiftConnect Unifies Enterprise Access Management Operations with ServiceNow Spoke
summary: NEW YORK, October 28, 2025--SwiftConnect, provider of the connected access network for places and spaces, today announced it has joined the ServiceNow Build Partner Program with the release of its ServiceNow Spoke integration in the ServiceNow Store. headline: Horizon3.ai Integrates NodeZero® with ServiceNow Vulnerability Response to Drive Risk-Based Remediation
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, October 28, 2025--Horizon3.ai, the leading provider of offensive security solutions, today announced the launch of its NodeZero® integration with ServiceNow Vulnerability Response (VR). The new capability enables customers to automatically send information about exploitable weaknesses identified by NodeZero directly within the ServiceNow AI Platform.
